articles.description: You can now run Photoshop and Visual Studio Code natively on the new Apple Macs running on the ARM based M1 processors. Read on for more!
articles.content: Apples transition from Intel to its own ARM chipset for Mac products is going smoother than expected. Adobe has now released Photoshop for Apple’s M1-based Macs adding an important piece of software … [+1923 chars]

articles.author: Akhil Arora
articles.title: Netflix Mobile+ Plan Returns to India at Lower Rs. 299 Price Point in New Test - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Netflix is testing a new Rs. 299 per month Mobile+ plan in India that allows members to stream HD 720p video and access the streaming service on computers. This was previously tested at Rs. 349.
